# [FEAT] Agent Performance Metrics

## Labels
`reporting`, `priority:high`

## Description
Implement comprehensive agent performance metrics and reporting.

## Requirements

### Individual Metrics
- Tickets solved
- First response time (average)
- Full resolution time (average)
- CSAT score
- Tickets reopened
- One-touch tickets (solved on first reply)
- Public vs. internal replies

### Productivity Metrics
- Tickets handled per day/week
- Active time tracking
- Reply count
- Response quality scores
- Workload distribution

### Quality Metrics
- Customer satisfaction ratings
- Escalation rate
- Reopen rate
- SLA compliance
- Quality assurance scores

### Team Comparisons
- Team averages
- Agent rankings
- Peer comparisons
- Goal progress
- Trend analysis

### Reporting Features
- Individual scorecards
- Team scorecards
- Performance dashboards
- Historical comparisons
- Export capabilities

### Gamification (optional)
- Achievement badges
- Leaderboards
- Performance goals
- Recognition system

## Zendesk Reference
Key metrics like chat volume, chat duration, and average reply time provide insights into agent performance. You can see which agents are handling the most chats and who's resolving them the quickest.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Individual metrics tracked
- [ ] Productivity metrics available
- [ ] Quality metrics calculated
- [ ] Team comparisons work
- [ ] Reporting functional
